mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.id,m.material_name,b.num FROM tb_material m left join tb_material_relation mr on m.id = mr.material_id left join (select m.id, m.material_name,count(m.id) num from tb_company c left join tb_material_relation mr on mr.company_id = c.id left join tb_material m on m.id = mr.material_id where c.id =#{userid} and mr.data_type=0 group by m.id) b on b.id = m.id where mr.data_type=0 limit #{start},#{pageSize}

select count(A.id) from (SELECT DISTINCT m.id,m.material_name,b.num FROM tb_material m left join tb_material_relation mr on m.id = mr.material_id left join (select m.id, m.material_name,count(m.id) num from tb_company c left join tb_material_relation mr on mr.company_id = c.id left join tb_material m on m.id = mr.material_id where c.id = 1 and mr.data_type=0 group by m.id) b on b.id = m.id where mr.data_type=0)A
